remarks: The Euler ` phi ` function is a multiplicative function, meaning that it distributes over multiplication at relatively prime arguments. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2014.)
statement: phimul $p |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN /\ ( M gcd N ) = 1 ) -> ( phi ` ( M x. N ) ) = ( ( phi ` M ) x. ( phi ` N ) ) ) $.
